import re
f = open("../input/amazon_cells_labelled.csv")
text = f.read()
f.close()
text = re.sub(r",+\n","\n",text)
text = re.sub(r",0\n","|0\n",text)
text = re.sub(r",1\n","|1\n",text)
text = re.sub(r"[.,\/#!$%\^&\*;:{}=\-_'~()\"]","",text)
#print(text)
f = open("clean.csv","w")
f.write(text)
f.close()
